I think the American people have got to start demanding more of our public officials and of the media, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell was secretary of state to Republican President Bush during the run-up to the Iraq War and the first years of the conflict and considered running for president as a Republican candidate in 1996.

Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt , 55, had been chief executive for 10 years- "a nice round number"- and Page, now 37, was ready to lead the company into the future.

Mike Pence says the American public is learning that their taxpayer dollars are subsidizing these organizations that are promoting abortion across this country. Rep.
